about_the_game:
Heavily drawing inspiration from the likes of Zombies Ate My Neighbors, DUMP OF THE DEAD X casts you as a guy who’s just chilling in every man’s safe space — the bathroom. He notices that a zombie apocalypse is sweeping his neighborhood, so he delves into the toilet bowl, grabs his gas mask, and sets out to live out his zombie movie fantasy. You couldn’t make this stuff up! It feels like something out of a spoof movie in the best kinda way.

The story:

No time to explain! It's a zombie apocalypse! You can't miss this! Let's have fun!

name: Dump of the Dead X Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
